#### Meet the worms!

*Caenorhabditis elegans* provide an opportunity to control the genetic and environmental  milieu in the lab. Using these non-parastic nematodes, I study the effect of toxicant exposure on disease pathology and global metabolism using untargeted metabolomic techniques.
